column5: The Globe and Mail has an article today that says the Canadian Olympic team sent 206 athletes to the Games and 88 of them won at least one medal. That's almost 43%.
a bit of a twist, when both hockey teams won medals
Yes and the 46 hockey players make up almost 25% of the 206.
As long as we're playing stats - about 30% of 'em took home gold.  JF
